abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Trade and Financial Sector
            Adjustment Loan will support the government's trade and
            financial sector reform program begun in 1987, the first
            phases of which were supported by the first Trade and
            Financial Sector Adjustment Loan.  The trade reform will
            reduce protection and make it more uniform across sectors
            and subsectors and increase competition and the efficiency
            of enterprises.  The financial sector reforms will
            strengthen the means for managing monetary policy, improve
            the regulatory framework and supervision of financial
            institutions and make the allocation of financial resources
            more efficient.  The loan will finance general imports
            subject to certain restrictions.
